DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether telephone-delivered Minimal Psychological Intervention ( MPI ) could improve diabetes ' depressive symptom diabetes-related immediately , well HbA1c level long-term .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Diabetes disease Were use antidepression medication With ongoing psychological/psychiatric treatment Had diagnose psychosis ( ex . schizophrenia bipolar disorder ) Had severe cognitive problem hearing impairment Lost partner within three month
